meanings.definition: The state of being without cheer or happiness.
meanings.sent1: Her face showed cheerlessness after receiving the bad news.
meanings.sent2: The cheerlessness in the room was palpable as everyone sat in silence.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, his attempts to bring cheer to the party only resulted in more cheerlessness.
meanings.sent4: The cheerlessness of the abandoned house made it seem haunted even in broad daylight.
meanings.sent5: The cheerlessness of the rainy day matched her somber mood perfectly.
